name: Pecan Sweet Potatoes
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Cook sweet potatoes in boiling salt water until tender. Peel and cut in half lengthwise. Place in 1 1?2 quart shallow casserole one layer thick. Sprinkle with sugar and pecans. Pour on orange juice, rind and Sherry. Dot with butter. Cover and bake in preheated oven, 350Â° for Shirley Drury 45 minutes or until juice has cooked into potatoes.
